author: A Google User
comment: Like everyone else I feel cheated when I talk with my friend who has the same app on his iphone. I now have an ipad but they want another $30 bucks from me to get that one. No way.

reply.author: Shotzoom Software
reply.content: Thanks for the review! Golfshot Plus Members can upgrade to Pro at 50% OFF the normal price. Contact our Support Team at support@golfshot.com to learn more about this discount for Plus Members.

author: A Google User
comment: I have reviewed this app before but after playing 2 new courses in 2 days I cannot rate it too highly. Perfect on my Galaxy S using Juice Defender.

author: Pairat OngsriRBS
comment: What a shame for me i do not read carefully i bought Samsung S3 (watch) which is not android wear so i cant use it throught my watch please do some in tizen os thanks for a great app

author: Reginald Kennedy
comment: Having problems with accuracy on yardages. Was working rite on and now is 15 yards shorter on (front-center-back)

author: Craig Zeman
comment: I have used this app for over 5 years. It has every course I have played across the USA. The best.

author: Tosin Akinbiyi
comment: Coming from using the iPhone version the last couple of years I am very disappointed.  That version displays much more information which I can't access on this edition. Otherwise it is a decent app.

author: Brian Allen
comment: Good app, but the GPS can be slow to mark distances and the scoring ability at times gets greyed out randomly.

author: Mark Angell
comment: An excellent golf aid. Very competitively priced. Would be even better if it showed stableford points totals. Highly recommended.

author: Eugene Thompson Sr
comment: I just started using this app today but it works really well from tee to green and in between.  It is as good  as having a cattie. I love so far I had fun playing with it. Thanks Golf shot.

author: Kittipong Visamitanan
comment: Very good app. Can use it for manage golf game strategy and also helpful for approach shot.

author: Stephen Myers
comment: Great app!  Good distances, and easy interface!

author: Ian Colthart
comment: Cranbourne Vic Australia's new14th hole opened over a year ago. Will this be updated on this app? If so, when?

reply.author: Shotzoom Software
reply.content: Our team would be happy to add/update your course. Please contact us at support@golfshot.com and we will get Cranbourne Vic updated for you.

author: Corey Scruggs
comment: Has most courses, keeps your stats, best app for the price.

author: Patrick Griffiths
comment: A superb app thanks
Great app. Always quick response to any questions I have submitted.

author: Richard Mueller
comment: Please make it compatible with Samsung watches.

reply.author: Shotzoom Software
reply.content: Richard - Plus is not a subscription app. Your one-time purchase for lifetime features is still valid. You can choose to upgrade to Pro if you want. All of your favorite Classic features, statistics, and rounds are included in Plus at NO additional cost to you.

author: Bruce Doyel
comment: Great app.easy to use.

author: Noi Suchavadee
comment: the best, used it for many years

author: A Google User
comment: Been using this as my main scorekeeping tool for years now.  I love it & it keeps getting better!  Still do miss statistics comparison to similar golfers.

reply.author: Shotzoom Software
reply.content: That is great feedback. Thanks for sharing and please let us know if we can assist you with anything in the future by contacting our support team at support@golfhsot.com.

author: William J Babineau
comment: Only been using Golf Shot for a month now, the more I use it, the better it gets! Like a caddie in my back pocket. Still exploring all the features. And the people I play with love it also, Thanks
GPS A bit buggy but still a good app. Particularly like the ability app has for club/distance recommendations.

reply.author: Shotzoom Software
reply.content:
Thanks for the feedback here. If you are experiencing issues with GPS, please contact our support team at support@golfshot.com; we may be able to help improve your experience. 

Thanks!

author: Bill Tomkovic
comment: Tells me everything I need to know about distances to various places including the ones I can't see. Tracks my score and posts to GHIN.  What more do you want?

author: Jesus Villa
comment: Great for keeping my score and handicap. Distance marks are also good.

reply.author: Shotzoom Software
reply.content: Great to hear that you are using Golfshot for your Handicap Index, and thanks for the feedback. Have fun out there!

author: T Hlpn
comment: I've been using Golfshot Plus since 2010 and I love it. Its just like having a caddie in your pocket.

author: Rick Lavell
comment: Good app that keeps getting better. Had it for many years. GPS usually accurate within a yard or two.

author: K2 Line
comment: DON'T UPGRADE TO PRO. CRASHES EVERY TIME.  I just paid a $14.99 yearly subscription that is supposed to enable me to post scores to my GHIN. The app crashes EVERY time I try to post a score. There is this extra fee (even above the paid version) so I can post scores directly from the app bit it does not function at all. Will be asking for a refund.

reply.author: Shotzoom Software
reply.content:
Hello, 

Please contact our team at support@golfshot.com. Golfshot shouldn't be crashing, so we can assist you in resolving the issue. 

Thanks!

author: Joseph Pearson
comment: I bought this app a few month ago for £24.99 and it never keeps upto date with where i walk. The distances take some time to actually set up right and it jumps to within 50 and 100yards everytime. My friends use a free app and have better and quicker distances than me! This needs resolved! Waste of money! When i played in portugal it just didnt work at all, very poor

reply.author: Shotzoom Software
reply.content:
Joseph, 

Sorry about that! Please contact our support team at support@golfshot.com for assistance with this. The GPS shouldn't be jumping around like that. I suggest restarting your phone before your next round to reset the GPS. 

Thanks!

author: Dennis Snowberger
comment: I am hoping you can help. My golf season is just starting. I haven't used my Golfshot Plus since last fall. I have used Golfshot for a good number of years and it has always worked good. However, for some reason it won't allow me to add golfers this year. Once I select the course and select the Tee box I try to add golfers and it will take me out to the list of previous golfers. I select one and make any changes for them, etc. and do the SAVE, then when I return to the setup screen it  is reset. I have to start over. I do this many times and it does the same thing. I have uninstalled and then reinstalled Golfshot Plus. Also, I can't make changes to my information, such as handicap. When I do it, it seems to take then I Save but when I return to the setup everything is reset. Very frustrating. I wonder if I may have too many golfer listed. I did delete a few previous/recent golfers but didn't help.. FYI I have a Samsung Galaxy S4 that has worked great with your app for a long time.

reply.author: Shotzoom Software
reply.content: Hello Dennis, that is odd. It looks like our team has been in contact with you to try to fix this problem. Please let us know if it is still occurring for you and if we can help further. Thank you!

author: Salim Danishwar
comment: Need to make it compatible with gear s3

author: Ilkka Makela
comment: Great and easy to use, provides everything for shot and score tracking, and distances

author: John Elliott
comment: I am impressed with this application.

author: L & H Roberts
comment: Very happy, good app

author: Michael Still
comment: Solid

author: Dale Fixsen
comment: Easy-to-use

author: Mike Hall-Hall
comment: Good as a score card but missing a few useful facilities. Would be nice to be able adjust player details after the round has started. Also cannot easily see Stapleford points per hole and the stroke index

reply.author: Shotzoom Software
reply.content: Hi Mike, you can edit player information by opening up the round menu, selecting Edit Golfers and selecting a golfer. You can see both the stroke index and Stableford points when you turn your phone to the side to view the scorecard. Hope this helps!

author: A Google User
comment: Updated review...this is a great Golf GPS app. Golf Frontier is still my favorite because the price is so much better and allows u to do more, but this app is excellent, too.

author: Kenneth Wong
comment: A works perfectly on the Huawei Mate 9. Quick and responsive. New UI takes some getting used to, but it works well

author: michael031288
comment: The IOS version seems to allow automatic Handicap tracking. The Android version doesn't. Unless you live in the USA and are willing to pay an extra $65 a year... I want a refund.

reply.author: Shotzoom Software
reply.content: We are working to include Handicap Index tracking and posting on the Android app for the future. Apologies for the inconvenience.

author: Brendan Webb
comment: Absolutely great app, I hope that one day they'll be able to integrate ball GPS to make it easier and less taking the phone out of my pocket.

author: Joseph Shaw
comment: Very accurate GPS. If you use all of the performance tracking features you will see all of the areas of your game that need improvement.
